text: Bigū (ej Muhammad ʙaroi muşrikoni qavmat), onone, ki ʙar tu in guna duo kardanro inkor namudand: cī Allohro ʙixoned, cī Rahmonro ʙixoned farqe namekunad, har kadomro ki az asmoi husno, ki ʙixoned mone' nadorad, nomhoi nekū az oni Ūst. Ej Pajomʙar, hangome, ki ʙa namoz istodī dar namoz sadojatro ʙaland makun va niz past ham maxon va mijoni in du rohe intixoʙ kun
